name: Lichcraft
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look/turn
  • Look at a container to automatically open it
  • LMB while looking at a container to grab/place a phylactery
  • LMB (hold) to cast spells

Playing the judge instruction:

I'll share my connection info. The judge will input my IP address and click Join.

Theme, Mechanic & How To Connect:

Theme: Fantasy. The game is about liches, which are creatures from fantasy (at least, I hope they aren't real).

Mechanic: Find the other player's phylactery before they find yours

Connecting: I will host, and will provide my external IP/port to the judge over discord 

Credits:

- creak sound: https://freesound.org/people/Lightnessko/sounds/390323/ (CC0)
- font: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/medio (CC0)

Gameplay Details:

  • Casting spells costs mana, which is also your life
  • Spells that hit the other player damage their mana
  • Spells that hit the floor create a trap
  • If your mana hits 0, you turn into a ghost. Return to your phylactery to respawn
  • You may relocate your phylactery during the match
  • If killed while holding your phylactery, it is an instant game-over
